Title: Inline Edit Box .NET
Description: InlineEditBox.net is a .NET control that adds in-line text editing capabilities with one line of code. This is great for forms and administrative areas giving you the possibility to edit a piece of text inline, and submitting it not via a submit button, but instead with AJAX.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
InlineEditBox.net is a .NET control that adds in-line text editing capabilities with one line of code. This is great for forms and administrative areas giving you the possibility to edit a piece of text inline, and submitting it not via a submit button, but instead with AJAX.
